metadata.name: Suspicious Certreq Command to Download
metadata.comment: Detects a suspicious certreq execution taken from the LOLBAS examples, which can be abused to download (small) files

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\certreq.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('certreq.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -post ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -config ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' http')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' c:\\windows\\win.ini ')))

output.summary: Detects a suspicious certreq execution taken from the LOLBAS examples, which can be abused to download (small) files

metadata.objective: Examine fields: process.cmd_line, process.parent_process.cmd_line False positive: Unlikely Reference: https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/Binaries/Certreq/
